verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050> Praise<WH1984> Yahweh,<WH3050> my soul.<WH5315>
While I live,<WH2416> I will praise<WH1984> Yahweh.<WH3068> I will sing praises<WH2167> to my God as long as I exist.<WH430>
Don't<WH982> put your trust in princes,<WH5081> each a son<WH1121> of man<WH120> in whom there is no help.<WH8668>
His spirit<WH7307> departs,<WH3318> and he returns<WH7725> to the earth.<WH127> In that very day,<WH3117> his thoughts<WH6250> perish.<WH6>
Happy<WH835> is he who has the God<WH410> of Jacob<WH3290> for his help,<WH5828> whose hope<WH7664> is in Yahweh,<WH3068> his God:<WH430>
who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth,<WH776> the sea,<WH3220> and all that is in them;<WH8104> who keeps truth<WH571> forever;<WH5769>
who executes<WH6213> justice<WH4941> for the oppressed;<WH6231> who gives<WH5414> food<WH3899> to the hungry.<WH7457> Yahweh<WH3068> frees<WH5425> the prisoners.<WH631>
Yahweh<WH3068> opens<WH6491> the eyes of the blind.<WH5787> Yahweh<WH3068> raises<WH2210> up those who are bowed down.<WH3721> Yahweh<WH3068> loves<WH157> the righteous.<WH6662>
Yahweh<WH3068> preserves<WH8104> the foreigners.<WH1616> He upholds<WH5749> the fatherless<WH3490> and widow,<WH490> but the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> he turns upside down.<WH5791>
Yahweh<WH3068> will reign<WH4427> forever;<WH5769> your God,<WH430> O Zion,<WH6726> to all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755> Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050>
